title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 194.1 - Record retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 194.1 - Record retention

State Regulations
(a) Each
participant shall keep all relevant records for their duration of program
participation plus three years. (b) The department shall have the right to inspect all relevant records upon
reasonable notice to the participant. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
